/usr/bin/c++    -std=c++0x -Wl,--no-as-needed  -Wall -ffunction-sections   -fomit-frame-pointer -O2 -ffast-math -DNDEBUG  -lpthread      CMakeFiles/raspicam_test.dir/raspicam_test.cpp.o  -o raspicam_test -Wl,-rpath,/opt/vc/lib: -rdynamic ../src/libraspicam.a /opt/vc/lib/libmmal_core.so /opt/vc/lib/libmmal_util.so /opt/vc/lib/libmmal.so
